shortDescription: Sets the region that the GPU can draw on.

arguments.description: The top-left X coord of the clipping area.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The top-left Y coord of the clipping area.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The width of the clipping area.
arguments.name: w

arguments.description: The height of the clipping area.
arguments.name: h

usages.name: Enable clipping:
usages.note: The arguments can be passed in a table.
